scrabble.playable

Class ClassicScrabble

  • java.lang.Object
    • scrabble.Game
      • scrabble.playable.ClassicScrabble

  • public class ClassicScrabble
extends Game
    Class that represents the Classic Scrabble game. Board Size: 15 cells Players: 2-4 Player's rack size: 7 letters Bundles: -scrabble.localization.AlphabetDistribution -scrabble.localization.AlphabetPoints -scrabble.localization.Alphabet Default Rules.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    George Piskas
